title: [BUG] classification recipe fails in transform step due to missing positive_class specifier

labels.name: area/recipes
labels.description: MLflow Recipes, Recipes APIs, Recipes configs, Recipe Templates

body:
### Issues Policy acknowledgement

- [X] I have read and agree to submit bug reports in accordance with the [issues policy](https://www.github.com/mlflow/mlflow/blob/master/ISSUE_POLICY.md)

### Willingness to contribute

No. I cannot contribute a bug fix at this time.

### MLflow version

- mlflow: 2.1.1


### System information

- **Ubuntu 22.04**:
- **Python version 3.10 **:


### Describe the problem

I fail to run the notebook from the classification recipe:
https://github.com/mlflow/recipes-examples/blob/main/classification/notebooks/jupyter.ipynb

where the transform fails due to this error
`MlflowException: Failed to run step 'transform' of recipe 'classification'. An error was encountered while running step 'transform': Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/schlembach/miniconda3/envs/mlflow/lib/python3.10/site-packages/mlflow/recipes/step.py", line 139, in run
    self.step_card = self._run(output_directory=output_directory)
  File "/home/schlembach/miniconda3/envs/mlflow/lib/python3.10/site-packages/mlflow/recipes/steps/transform.py", line 105, in _run
    validate_classification_config(self.task, self.positive_class, train_df, self.target_col)
  File "/home/schlembach/miniconda3/envs/mlflow/lib/python3.10/site-packages/mlflow/recipes/utils/step.py", line 182, in validate_classification_config
    raise MlflowException(
mlflow.exceptions.MlflowException: `positive_class` must be specified for classification/v1 recipes.`

### Tracking information

_No response_

### Code to reproduce issue

Step to reproduce, run this notebook:
https://github.com/mlflow/recipes-examples/blob/main/classification/notebooks/jupyter.ipynb

This cell fails:
r.run("transform")


### Stack trace

The following error is produced, although positive_class is correctly noted in the recipe.yaml (https://github.com/mlflow/recipes-examples/blob/main/classification/recipe.yaml , l. 17)

`MlflowException: Failed to run step 'transform' of recipe 'classification'. An error was encountered while running step 'transform': Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/schlembach/miniconda3/envs/mlflow/lib/python3.10/site-packages/mlflow/recipes/step.py", line 139, in run
    self.step_card = self._run(output_directory=output_directory)
  File "/home/schlembach/miniconda3/envs/mlflow/lib/python3.10/site-packages/mlflow/recipes/steps/transform.py", line 105, in _run
    validate_classification_config(self.task, self.positive_class, train_df, self.target_col)
  File "/home/schlembach/miniconda3/envs/mlflow/lib/python3.10/site-packages/mlflow/recipes/utils/step.py", line 182, in validate_classification_config
    raise MlflowException(
mlflow.exceptions.MlflowException: `positive_class` must be specified for classification/v1 recipes.`


### Other info / logs

_No response_
